metadata.title: CVE-2023-24056 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In pkgconf through 1.9.3, variable duplication can cause unbounded string expansion due to incorrect checks in libpkgconf/tuple.c:pkgconf_tuple_parse. For example, a .pc file containing a few hundred bytes can expand to one billion bytes.

criterions.comment: pkgconf package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
